      • joinChannel

        public void joinChannel(java.lang.String server,
               java.lang.String channel,
               boolean isServer)
        Called when a user wishes to join a channel. This takes in the name of the server that the channel is on, the name of the channel, and if being called outside of the ChatWindow class, isServer should always be false.
        Parameters:
        server -
        channel -
        isServer -

      • newMessage

        public void newMessage(java.lang.String server,
              java.lang.String channel,
              java.lang.String message)
        Called when a message is received. It takes in the server name, the channel name, and the actual message. ChatWindow has a channel for the server connection itself that is of the same name as the server. The server channel should receive messages that are command responses.
        Parameters:
        server -
        channel -
        message -
